headerText: I made this page less awful!
mainTextHeader: So what on earth actually is this page?
mainText: It's pretty much just a random page for me to chuck all the weird things I make/half make onto. Don't expect anything actually useful - you're never gonna get it!
nws: Quite simply, the old version of this site was absolutely awful. It looked a bit.. uh.. ehh... and it wasn't exactly what I'd call responsive. This newer version should fix those problems, whilst also giving me the ability to add fancy new things! Yay!
